token_info.description: [T002G] A beloved puzzle game archetype makes its debut on Hic Et Nunc. Use Arrows/WASD/swipe to move blocks. Combine them to double their value. Try to get to 2048! This meditative version by Theo (theoaud.io) features musical sound effects that become ever more pleasing as the game progresses. Press Z and M together at any point to return to the title screen. Beware: Addictive. This game contains flashing/strobing colors.
